trans-unit.source: HDInsight Hadoop PowerShell Cmdlet Cheat Sheet | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: HDInsight Hadoop PowerShell Cmdlet Cheat Sheet | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: A downloadable HDInsight Hadoop powershell cmdlet cheat sheet that can help you perform standard Hadoop tasks in Azure HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: A downloadable HDInsight Hadoop powershell cmdlet cheat sheet that can help you perform standard Hadoop tasks in Azure HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Azure HDInsight PowerShell cmdlet cheat sheet for common Hadoop tasks
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Azure HDInsight PowerShell cmdlet cheat sheet for common Hadoop tasks

trans-unit.source: Microsoft Azure HDInsight provides PowerShell cmdlets to perform Hadoop tasks on a cluster.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Azure HDInsight provides PowerShell cmdlets to perform Hadoop tasks on a cluster.

trans-unit.source: The **Microsoft Azure HDInsight PowerShell Cmdlet Cheat Sheet** is designed to provide you with PowerShell cmdlets for the most common Hadoop tasks such as create a cluster, run jobs, delete a cluster, etc. The cheat sheet also provides a list of all the PowerShell cmdlets available for Microsoft Azure HDInsight.
trans-unit.target: The **Microsoft Azure HDInsight PowerShell Cmdlet Cheat Sheet** is designed to provide you with PowerShell cmdlets for the most common Hadoop tasks such as create a cluster, run jobs, delete a cluster, etc. The cheat sheet also provides a list of all the PowerShell cmdlets available for Microsoft Azure HDInsight.

trans-unit.source: HDInsight cheat sheet: Service Management model
trans-unit.target: HDInsight cheat sheet: Service Management model

trans-unit.source: **Download the cheat sheet here: [Microsoft Azure HDInsight PowerShell Cmdlet Cheat Sheet](http://download.microsoft.com/download/B/7/D/B7DBB509-164D-4343-9894-12D1FB053776/HDI_PowerShell_Cmdlet_CheatSheet.pdf)**
trans-unit.target: **Download the cheat sheet here: [Microsoft Azure HDInsight PowerShell Cmdlet Cheat Sheet](http://download.microsoft.com/download/B/7/D/B7DBB509-164D-4343-9894-12D1FB053776/HDI_PowerShell_Cmdlet_CheatSheet.pdf)**

trans-unit.source: **Look at the Microsoft Azure HDInsight PowerShell reference document: [Azure HDInsight PowerShell reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn858087.aspx)**
trans-unit.target: **Look at the Microsoft Azure HDInsight PowerShell reference document: [Azure HDInsight PowerShell reference](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/azure/dn858087.aspx)**
